component_name: MG996R High Torque Metal Gear Dual Ball Bearing Servo
description: A high-torque digital servo featuring metal gearing and dual ball bearings, delivering 9.4–11 kgf·cm stall torque and precise control via PWM.

getting_started.connection_guide: Use the 3‑pin 'S' type female header: VCC to power supply, GND to ground, and Control to a PWM signal from a receiver or microcontroller.

source_document: MG996R High Torque Metal Gear Dual Ball Bearing Servo specifications and description as provided in the source text.
